title: How to Make Vegan Quiche

steps.headline: Preheat your oven to 400 degrees Fahrenheit (205 degrees C) and in the meantime, coat a pie pan with cooking spray or butter.
Press the pie crust into the greased pie pan.
Bake the crust in the oven for 5 to 10 minutes until it becomes lightly browned.
steps.description: Set the crust aside and keep the oven hot.

steps.headline: Process 1/2 block of tofu with 1 teaspoon (5 ml) soymilk using a blender or immersion blender until smooth.
steps.description: Add salt and pepper to taste. Once it’s well blended, set it aside.

steps.headline: Heat 2 tablespoons (30 ml) extra virgin olive oil in a nonstick skillet.
steps.description: Add your chopped vegetables and sauté until tender.

steps.headline: Fold sautéed vegetables into the tofu mixture using a rubber spatula or spoon.
Fold 1/2 cup (115 g) grated vegan cheese into the tofu mixture.
Pour the tofu mixture into your pre-baked crust.
Top the quiche with more shredded vegan cheese and place the pie pan on top of a cookie sheet to catch any dribbles.
Bake at 400 degrees Fahrenheit (205 degrees C) for 45 minutes to an hour, until the center of the quiche has set firmly.

text: Preheat your oven to 400 degrees Fahrenheit (205 degrees C) and in the meantime, coat a pie pan with cooking spray or butter.  Press the pie crust into the greased pie pan.  Bake the crust in the oven for 5 to 10 minutes until it becomes lightly browned. Set the crust aside and keep the oven hot. Process 1/2 block of tofu with 1 teaspoon (5 ml) soymilk using a blender or immersion blender until smooth. Add salt and pepper to taste. Once it’s well blended, set it aside. Heat 2 tablespoons (30 ml) extra virgin olive oil in a nonstick skillet. Add your chopped vegetables and sauté until tender. Fold sautéed vegetables into the tofu mixture using a rubber spatula or spoon.  Fold 1/2 cup (115 g) grated vegan cheese into the tofu mixture.  Pour the tofu mixture into your pre-baked crust.  Top the quiche with more shredded vegan cheese and place the pie pan on top of a cookie sheet to catch any dribbles.  Bake at 400 degrees Fahrenheit (205 degrees C) for 45 minutes to an hour, until the center of the quiche has set firmly.  Finished.
